DOC.brief_summary: Checkrein deformity represent dynamic claw toe deformity . Surgical intervention treatment choice many method propose . The purpose study evaluate outcome complication percutaneous segmental tenotomy toe flexor tendon .
DOC.brief_title: Percutaneous Tenotomy Toe Flexor Tendon Simple Efficient Method Treating Checkrein Deformity
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator review fourteen patient checkrein deformity underwent surgery hospital 1993 2010 . Five patient receive FHL flexor digitorum longus ( FDL ) tenolysis musculotendinous junction ; among , two also underwent Z-plasty lengthening FHL tendon . Nine patient underwent percutaneous segmental toe flexor tenotomy . The Hallux Metatarsophalangeal- Interphalangeal Scale ( Hallux MTP-IP scale ) Foot Ankle Outcome Score ( FAOS ) , English version LK1.0 self-explanatory questionnaire use evaluate functional outcome .
